lead_paragraph: The market slipped to modest losses as stocks drifted lower in afternoon trading as falling oil prices pulled down energy stocks.

headline.print_headline: Dip in Oil Prices Takes Steam Out of Market
headline.main: Wall St. Slides Back as Hopes Dim for Greece Accord

snippet: The market slipped to modest losses as stocks drifted lower in afternoon trading as falling oil prices pulled down energy stocks.
abstract: Stock market declines slightly from big gains of previous week, which analysts attribute to investors digesting previous jobs report data.
